summary: Just a few islands that I made.
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone! This is my first released mod! I've used the Creation Kit (and Construction set in Oblivion) in the past, but I mostly just messed around. About a week ago, however, I decided that I really wanted to make a legitimate, release-worthy mod, and so this was born.

The Landscape: It's just a few islands, and the waters aren't filled with much. Also includes one small cave and a decently sized dungeon-style cave.

How to get there: I've added a trapdoor to the boat in Dawnstar, simply enter it and you'll end up on the islands.

Enjoy, and make sure to give me some criticism! I know the mod isn't even close to perfect, and, in comparison to a LOT of mods on here, it's not that great. :)

Credits:
"Resources for modders" by Runspect
"Hoddminir's Modders Resources"
"Tamira's Plant Resources" by Tamira
"tiger retexture and skin" by muppetpuppet

author: Youk
